lines.text: Wake up! Wake up, Sailor Moon! You did it it! You stopped the planet!
Sailor Moon! No! You said everything would be all right.
The moon crystal used all her strength. We can't lose her!
Wake up! You can't leave us alone like this.
Don't go, Sailor Moon. You're the glue that holds all of us together.
The reason the Earth seems so evil to you is that the Sailor Scouts drive out the negative forces!

[the Sailor Scouts are spying on Serena and Darien kissing]
Yuck! Serena's gettin' kissed, how gross!
Just look at Miss Fish Lips, all puckered up like some...
There is no beauty in a world that is completely still!

[pointing toy gun at Sailor Moon]
May I remind you that you're a superhero?
Why is it do you think we fight for you?
